title: How to View a Private Facebook Picture

steps.title: Find a friend who is friends on Facebook with the person whose private picture you are trying to view.
steps.content: Find a friend who is friends on Facebook with the person whose private picture you are trying to view.

steps.title: Ask the friend to right click and open the private picture in a new tab.
steps.content: Ask the friend to right click and open the private picture in a new tab.

steps.title: Ask the friend to send you the link for the private picture in the new tab.
steps.content: Ask the friend to send you the link for the private picture in the new tab.

steps.title: Click on the link sent to you.
steps.content: Click on the link sent to you.

steps.title: You should be able to see the private picture with the link for the new tab sent to you.
steps.content: You should be able to see the private picture with the link for the new tab sent to you.

steps.title: Download a Facebook profile viewer from the internet.
steps.content: Download a Facebook profile viewer from the internet. To find a Facebook profile viewer, search "Facebook profile viewers" on the internet.

steps.title: Find a particular Facebook URL of the private profile you want to view.
steps.content: Find a particular Facebook URL of the private profile you want to view.

steps.title: Paste the URL, and search for it using the Facebook profile viewer.
steps.content: Paste the URL, and search for it using the Facebook profile viewer.

steps.title: It should then show you the profile you want to view, including private pictures.
steps.content: It should then show you the profile you want to view, including private pictures. This method may expose your computer to unwanted to viruses, so use it with caution.
